messages.message: There are variations of this problem which are possible. Are they looking to split along page boundaries or within a page boundary?
Do they want separate PDFs for debugging purposes or are they OK with simply different records in the out.ibocr file that we generate
theyâ€™d like to split at document boundaries; this is a packet of a bunch of different loan applications, and the various docs inside get pushed to different systems
they use a product called Ephesoft to do this now; it splits the docs and then classifies them to figure out where to put each one
its classification process is kind of interesting; it uses first, last, and middlemost page to classify
Oh interesting I see. It requires some instrumentation on our end but is technically possible if we 1) do a code change and 2) string together 2 flows in a somewhat hacky way
Can we chat Monday about it? There are some constructs we want to put in Flow to make and this powsible. Since there are many possibilities let's chat on Monday
To add those constructs though is non trivial
talking about it monday sounds great
